definitions.definition: To insert ( pages , which are normally blank) between the pages of a book .
To intersperse (something) at regular intervals between the parts of a thing or between items in a group.
To allocate (things such as successive segments of memory ) to different tasks .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To insert ( pages , which are normally blank) between the pages of a book .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To intersperse (something) at regular intervals between the parts of a thing or between items in a group.
( computing , transitive ) To allocate (things such as successive segments of memory ) to different tasks .
